name: saas-medical-tracker
description: SaaS Medical Tracker - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend:fix && npm run lint:frontend:fix
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check . --fix && ruff format .
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migrate:create: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:migrate:down: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic downgrade -1
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -e '.[dev]'

author: Medical Tracker Team
